enhancedContent.overview:
The AirBnB Guest Handbook streamlines your short-term rental hosting by providing guests with a comprehensive, shareable digital guide directly in Notion. This all-inclusive handbook answers common questions before they're asked, reducing host workload while elevating the guest experience with professional, always-updated information.

Instead of answering the same questions via message after message, this template lets you create once and share indefinitely. Update house rules, check-in procedures, WiFi passwords, or local recommendations anytime‚Äîthe shared link stays the same, ensuring guests always have current information at their fingertips.

features: Contact details and emergency numbers in one accessible location
Detailed house rules and property guidelines
Check-in and checkout procedures with step-by-step instructions
Property location details and directions for arrival
Appliance operation guides (heating, cooling, laundry systems)
Cleaning guidelines and expectations during stay
WiFi network information and connection instructions
Restaurant recommendations with cuisine types and price ranges
Tourist attractions and must-see spots nearby
Transportation options and public transit information
Shopping, entertainment, and local services directory
One-time setup with unlimited sharing via stable link
Easy updates that automatically reflect for all future guests
No Notion account required for guests to view
Professional presentation that enhances property value

problemsSolved: Eliminates repetitive guest questions about WiFi passwords, check-in times, appliance usage, and local recommendations
Prevents miscommunication about house rules and checkout procedures that can lead to disputes or poor reviews
Solves the problem of outdated printed materials that require reprinting every time something changes
Removes the burden of being constantly available to answer basic property questions during guest stays
solutionsBenefits: Answer every common question once in the handbook, then share the same link with every guest automatically at booking
Update any information instantly (WiFi password, recommended restaurants, house rules) without needing to contact past or current guests
Guests access the handbook via public web link‚Äîno Notion account required‚Äîmaking it universally accessible from any device
Professional digital guide positions your property as well-managed and guest-focused, leading to better reviews and repeat bookings
idealFor: Airbnb and VRBO hosts managing one or multiple short-term rental properties who want to provide excellent guest communication
Property managers handling bookings for multiple owners who need consistent, professional guest materials
First-time hosts looking to establish professional systems and reduce the learning curve of guest management
Experienced hosts who want to scale their operations by reducing time spent answering repetitive questions
Hosts in tourist-heavy areas who frequently get asked for local recommendations and directions
notRecommendedFor: Hosts with extremely simple properties where a basic printed sheet suffices and digital updates aren't necessary
Those renting exclusively to long-term tenants who don't need tourist information or frequent guidance

faqs.question: How do I get started with this guest handbook template?
faqs.answer: After duplicating the template to your Notion workspace, customize it with your property details, house rules, and local recommendations. Then publish the page to the web (making it publicly accessible) and share the link with guests at booking confirmation. The template includes a video walkthrough to guide you through customization.

faqs.question: What's included in this template?
faqs.answer: The handbook includes sections for contact information, property location and directions, check-in/checkout procedures, house rules, appliance instructions (heating, laundry, cleaning), WiFi details, emergency contacts, local restaurant and attraction guides, transportation options, and customizable sections for property-specific information.

faqs.question: Can I customize this template for my property?
faqs.answer: Yes, the template is fully customizable within Notion. Add your branding, adjust sections to match your property features, include specific appliance manuals, customize local recommendations for your area, add photos of your property, and modify the layout to emphasize what matters most to your guests. All content can be edited to fit your unique hosting style.

faqs.question: What are the main use cases for this handbook?
faqs.answer: Primary use cases include providing check-in information to arriving guests, answering common questions about property amenities and operation, sharing local area recommendations for dining and activities, communicating house rules and expectations clearly, reducing host workload by centralizing all guest information, and creating a professional impression that leads to better reviews and ratings.
